response.overview: In his series of shorts for Cake on FXX, California artist/director Joseph Bennett explores characters from America’s underclass in painstaking (and often painful) detail. Case in point: Jay, certified narcissist/vacuum sales wizard.  Produced by FX Productions, Cake is a weekly anthology series featuring “a diverse array of narratives from storytellers both new and established that are equal parts thought-provoking, laugh-inducing and authentic.”
response.tagline: You are about to meet Jay. And your life will never be the same
response.title: Jay
